title: Shop Online Website - Adult Toys & Lingerie
text: Questions Business Summary The e-commerce adult toy store and lingerie turnkey website for sale offer everything you need to start your own adult toy store and lingerie business online. A complete and thorough online solution for all your selling needs. The website only features a small number of products (close to 2000) at the moment to highlight functionality and start you off. You can start adding your products right after the purchase, no special computer skills required at all. Managing your store has never been easier. Our programmers and designers have ensured that you will have the most positive experience there is while bringing a handsome profit to your household or current/new business. Features: Wholesalers Account in Place ready for you Integrated shopping cart Built-in payment and shipping modules to meet yours and your customers' needs Automatic order notification and confirmation e-mails Built-in search feature for easy navigation Flexible taxation, shipping and payment system Product and category management a breeze through a graphical user interface Special products, Featured products, discount coupons and vouchers Banner management Carousel and slideshow modules to feature hand-picked products and services Easy back-up through our hosting control panel Reports on items purchased, viewed, etc. Administrative dashboard for quick overview of website status Unlimited number of products and categories supported Effortless meta-tag management for the best possible SEO optimizatoin Product reviews and ratings Add your products on the website for sale. Give discounts, create special offers, write compelling content to entice your customers. Reap the benefits of this easy to set up online business that does not require hefty initial investments. Optionally use subtle and content-relevant banner advertising to further sales and improve on customer experience. Asking $12,000. Email or call 613-707-6116. Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: Sellers Discretionary Cash Inventory: Free hosting for 1st year. Seller Financing: Not Disclosed
